entry.title: The Hunt for the Argent Codex
entry.summary:
Author: Ticket_to_Insanity

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,864Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Hunters across the globe are seeking the Argent Codex - a mythical book said to hold spells, maps, and rituals that can tip the supernatural balance. After a mysterious group attacks Scott and steals a page from Deaton's collection, Stiles is forced to team up with Derek, who recently returned to Beacon Hills tracking the same cult.The two set off on a road trip across old supernatural sites to stop the cult from reassembling the Codex. Between magical threats, near-death experiences, and cramped motel rooms, their antagonism starts giving way to something hotter... and far more dangerous.

entry.title: Shattered and Bound
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,921Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 173

Summary: After losing Derek and his father to a feral Scott in the aftermath of the Nogitsune, a shattered Stiles kills his former best friend and is left drowning in guilt and grief.Unable to live in a world where everyone he loves is gone, he casts a one way time travel spell meant to rewrite it all - only to wake up years earlier than expected, in a peaceful dimension where he never existed and the Hales are still alive.Haunted by trauma and drawn to a younger, unbroken Derek, Stiles must navigate healing, fate, and love in a world that was never meant to be his.

entry.title: The Creator's Game
entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 70,456Chapters: 19/38Kudos: 27

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.

entry.title: Whispers in the Blood
entry.summary:
Author: DancingTearsSuou

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,799Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 7

Summary: Beacon Hills University is haunted—by shadows, by secrets, and by a series of brutal murders mimicking infamous urban legends. Derek Hale, a brooding new student with a mysterious past, and Stiles Stilinski, a sarcastic journalism major with a knack for uncovering dark truths, are drawn into a chilling web of horror. As the bodies pile up, so do the secrets, and their unlikely bond becomes the only constant in a world unraveling.

entry.title: How to Survive a Hurricane
entry.summary:
Author: Scavengersdaughter2

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 278,603Chapters: 11/26Kudos: 195

Summary: John Stilinski, head of the largest crime syndicate in The States, has passed away. The syndicate is in chaos. The underworld demands more blood. Hale Security is tasked with protecting John's only son, his successor, Stiles, until he can turn 18. A group of wolves to protect a- well, whatever Stiles is. Mafia AU, Bodyguard AU, Supernatural is Known AU. TW: Drug abuse, violence, Stiles=Not HumanAlso featuring oddly protective bees, sensitive crime lords, a team of werewolves who are grossly underpaid for the shit they have to put up with, a Druid godfather who is Having None of This, and two oblivious, damaged idiots in love.CH1:Derek adjusted in his chair, uncomfortable with his ignorance in the language of the tarot cards. "What do you mean 'yikes'?"Stiles continued staring at the card. "It means we're only two cards in and you've drawn the unluckiest card in the deck."Now Isaac was leaning closer, stealing glances. At least Boyd was more subtle with his eavesdropping.Derek ignored them both. "Elaborate.""It means calamity on almost any front- health, finance, romance. It can also mean the ending of pointless commitments and the beginning of a fresh stage in life."

entry.title: time fuckery
entry.summary:
Author: whimsicalmeerkat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,989Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 160

Summary: Stiles plunges through the preserve, hoping he hasn’t somehow gotten lost in these woods he’s very familiar with and that the light holds long enough to get him to his destination. He can tell the forest is younger than the one he left behind, so he knows he truly did travel back in time. Go him; he’s done with the part that almost everyone else would think is the hardest. Stiles knows the really hard part is still to come—getting Derek to trust him enough to believe Stiles when he warns him about Kate.~Stiles travels back in time to warn the Hales about Kate and prevent tragedy. Things go differently than he expects.
